TopicTitle: COMRADES GAMING___here at Comrades we Are looking for some new members___Check it out

Articles.Content:
I am one out of three leaders for Comrades Gaming & we hope to find some KSP gamer's to have an interest in joining Comrades gaming.

Comrades Gaming Brings gamer's from all over the world together through gaming. We host skype calls and play a large sum of games from Console to PC. Many of our members have been with us for years but we are bringing in new people all the time. We are not a strict clan but we do keep politics and religion out of the group.

Everyone here is kind, crazy and allot of fun to game with. We filter out the bad people from the good this way Comrades can maintain people who will get along.

If you are interested in joining us please Contact me on skype, facebook, or here.

To become a member we will have a fun gaming Skype interview and get to know one another.

We do not ask for any personal information.

Here is a link to our Kerbal advertisement
Oopsie. Looks like this is a duplicate thread. Closing now.
